0.text: Innate: Evelynn gains Demon Shade after not performing actions that break stealth for 4 seconds. Attacking or casting abilities ends Demon Shade immediately and places it on a 4-second static cooldown, reduced to 1.25 seconds from casting  Last Caress. Taking damage from  champions or  turrets interrupts Demon Shade and places it on a 1.5-second static cooldown.
0.html: Innate: Evelynn gains Demon Shade after not performing actions that break stealth for 4 seconds. Attacking or casting abilities ends Demon Shade immediately and places it on a 4-second static cooldown, reduced to 1.25 seconds from casting Last Caress. Taking damage from champions or turrets interrupts Demon Shade and places it on a 1.5-second static cooldown.
markedPassages: Last Caress
champions
turrets

1.text: Demon Shade: While below  250 − 590 (based on level) (+ 250% AP) health, Evelynn  heals herself for 15 − 150 (based on level) every second. From level 6 onward, Demon Shade also grants  camouflage.
1.html: Demon Shade: While below  250 − 590 (based on level) (+ 250% AP) health, Evelynn heals herself for 15 − 150 (based on level) every second. From level 6 onward, Demon Shade also grants camouflage.
markedPassages: 250 − 590 (based on level) (+ 250% AP) health
250 − 590 (based on level) (+ 250% AP) health
heals
camouflage

0.text: Active: Evelynn launches a dart in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and marking them for 4 seconds.
0.html: Active: Evelynn launches a dart in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and marking them for 4 seconds.

1.text: Evelynn's next 3 basic attacks or abilities against the marked target deal bonus magic damage.
1.html: Evelynn's next 3 basic attacks or abilities against the marked target deal bonus magic damage.

2.text: Hate Spike may be recast up to 3 times at no cost until the ability comes off cooldown.
2.html: Hate Spike may be recast up to 3 times at no cost until the ability comes off cooldown.

3.text: Recast: Evelynn unleashes a line of deadly spikes in the direction of her attack target if they are in range, dealing magic damage to all enemies struck. Hate Spike will first prioritize Evelynn's attack target, then the nearest  visible enemy champion.
3.html: Recast: Evelynn unleashes a line of deadly spikes in the direction of her attack target if they are in range, dealing magic damage to all enemies struck. Hate Spike will first prioritize Evelynn's attack target, then the nearest visible enemy champion.
markedPassages: visible

4.text: A nearby  visible enemy is required to recast this ability.
4.html: A nearby visible enemy is required to recast this ability.
markedPassages: visible

0.text: Active: Evelynn curses the target enemy  champion or  monster for 5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Evelynn curses the target enemy champion or monster for 5 seconds.
markedPassages: champion
monster

1.text: Evelynn's next basic attack or ability against the accursed target expunges them,  slowing them by 65% for 0.75 seconds.
1.html: Evelynn's next basic attack or ability against the accursed target expunges them, slowing them by 65% for 0.75 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

2.text: Expunging a target will refund Allure's  mana cost. If the target is cursed for at least 2.5 seconds, the expunge also  charms them for a few seconds and the duration of the  slow is increased to last for this time, as well as applying additional effects based on the target type.
2.html: Expunging a target will refund Allure's  mana cost. If the target is cursed for at least 2.5 seconds, the expunge also charms them for a few seconds and the duration of the slow is increased to last for this time, as well as applying additional effects based on the target type.
markedPassages: mana cost
mana cost
charms
slow

3.text: Against champions, the expunge also inflicts  magic resistance reduction for 4 seconds.Against monsters, the expunge deals bonus magic damage and the  charm lasts 2 seconds longer.
3.html:
Against champions, the expunge also inflicts  magic resistance reduction for 4 seconds.
Against monsters, the expunge deals bonus magic damage and the charm lasts 2 seconds longer.
markedPassages: magic resistance reduction
charm

4.text: Casting Allure does not break  Demon Shade nor its fade into it.
4.html: Casting Allure does not break Demon Shade nor its fade into it.
markedPassages: Demon Shade

0.text: Active: Evelynn whips the target enemy with her lashers, dealing magic damage and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
0.html: Active: Evelynn whips the target enemy with her lashers, dealing magic damage and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

0.content: 55 / 70 / 85 / 100 / 115 (+ 3% (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

markedPassages: on-hit
(+ 3% (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
(+ 3% (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

1.text: Evelynn also gains  30% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
1.html: Evelynn also gains  30% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: 30% bonus movement speed

2.text: Gaining  Demon Shade resets Whiplash's  cooldown and  empowers its next cast. The damage based on the target's health ratio for both Whiplash and its  empowered cast deals a minimum of 25 and is capped at 450 against  monsters.
2.html: Gaining Demon Shade resets Whiplash's  cooldown and empowers its next cast. The damage based on the target's health ratio for both Whiplash and its empowered cast deals a minimum of 25 and is capped at 450 against monsters.
markedPassages: Demon Shade
cooldown
empowers
empowered
monsters

0.text: Active: Evelynn  dashes toward the target enemy with her lashers, dealing  increased damage to them upon completion as well as to all enemies within her path.
0.html: Active: Evelynn dashes toward the target enemy with her lashers, dealing increased damage to them upon completion as well as to all enemies within her path.

0.content: 75 / 100 / 125 / 150 / 175 (+ 4% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

markedPassages: dashes
(+ 4% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
(+ 4% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

1.text: Empowered Whiplash only applies  on-hit effects to the primary target.
1.html: Empowered Whiplash only applies on-hit effects to the primary target.
markedPassages: on-hit

0.text: Active: Evelynn reveals her true form, becoming  untargetable at the start of the cast time and afterwards unleashing her lashers in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies struck within. After 0.5 seconds, she then  blinks 700 units in the opposite direction and becomes targetable again.
0.html: Active: Evelynn reveals her true form, becoming untargetable at the start of the cast time and afterwards unleashing her lashers in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies struck within. After 0.5 seconds, she then blinks 700 units in the opposite direction and becomes targetable again.
markedPassages: untargetable
blinks

1.text: Last Caress deals  140% increased damage to enemies below  30% of their maximum health.
1.html: Last Caress deals 140% increased damage to enemies below  30% of their maximum health.
markedPassages: 30% of their maximum health
30% of their maximum health

abilities.concerningText: Active: Evelynn launches a dart in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and marking them for 4 seconds.
Evelynn's next 3 basic attacks or abilities against the marked target deal bonus magic damage.
Evelynn's next 3 basic attacks or abilities against the marked target deal bonus magic damage.

Recast: Evelynn unleashes a line of deadly spikes in the direction of her attack target if they are in range, dealing magic damage to all enemies struck. Hate Spike will first prioritize Evelynn's attack target, then the nearest  visible enemy champion.

Expunging a target will refund Allure's  mana cost. If the target is cursed for at least 2.5 seconds, the expunge also  charms them for a few seconds and the duration of the  slow is increased to last for this time, as well as applying additional effects based on the target type.

Expunging a target will refund Allure's  mana cost. If the target is cursed for at least 2.5 seconds, the expunge also  charms them for a few seconds and the duration of the  slow is increased to last for this time, as well as applying additional effects based on the target type.
Against champions, the expunge also inflicts  magic resistance reduction for 4 seconds.Against monsters, the expunge deals bonus magic damage and the  charm lasts 2 seconds longer.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Evelynn  dashes toward the target enemy with her lashers, dealing  increased damage to them upon completion as well as to all enemies within her path.

0.concerningText: Against champions, the expunge also inflicts  magic resistance reduction for 4 seconds.Against monsters, the expunge deals bonus magic damage and the  charm lasts 2 seconds longer.

origin: 55 / 70 / 85 / 100 / 115 (+ 3% (+ 1.5% per 100 ap) of target's maximum health)
st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Evelynn whips the target enemy with her lashers, dealing them magic damage and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

origin: 75 / 100 / 125 / 150 / 175 (+ 4% (+ 2.5% per 100 ap) of target's maximum health)
st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Evelynn  dashes toward the target enemy with her lashers, dealing  increased damage to them upon completion as well as to all enemies within her path.

Expunging a target will refund Allure's  mana cost. If the target is cursed for at least 2.5 seconds, the expunge also  charms them for a few seconds and the duration of the  slow is increased to last for this time, as well as applying additional effects based on the target type.
Against champions, the expunge also inflicts  magic resistance reduction for 4 seconds.Against monsters, the expunge deals bonus magic damage and the  charm lasts 2 seconds longer.
